title: Pakistan
summary:
Citi has been an active member of the financial sector community and a  leading bank in taking the Government to international capital markets, including issues of the first Foreign Currency Sukuk, the first 30-year U.S. dollar sovereign bond and the first equity offering in more than a decade.

We are also the leading bank in Pakistan for delivering Export Agency and Multilateral financing and have been instrumental in the development of Pakistan's market for derivatives and other treasury products.

Citi Pakistan has a network of ICG branches across Karachi, Islamabad and Lahore, serving corporate clients in Pakistan's top metropolises.
tag-2: Citi has been operating in Pakistan since 1961.
